pages.text: It all begins with a Conductor. This new block can be placed below a Lightning rod, can hold an item. When lightning strikes the rod, the Conductor will 'charge' the item (if it can be charged of course).

The power of thunder, in the palm of your hands... This new weapon can be created by charging an empty bottle. You can also throw it to summon a lightning bolt where it hits. Useful for creating other charged items, charging creepers and getting you favorite Mooshroom color!
But that's not all! You can charge Copper Tools to make them stronger and faster! (I know copper tools are not that original, I just wanted to give them a little spin)
